short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for better debating on SCM PRs. Currently working only for Bitbucket.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why PrArgue?

Professional expressing: Not all developers have the ability to beautifully express their ideas, and even if they are right, the lack of vocabulary or inspiration in that moment decrease their persuasiveness.

Streamline Discussions: With PrArgue, gone are the days of cluttered and unstructured PR debates. Our intuitive interface organizes discussions, making it easier to follow arguments and counterarguments.

Enhance Clarity: PrArgue helps you articulate your points more clearly, ensuring that your suggestions and concerns are understood and appreciated by your peers.

Save Time: Reduce the back-and-forth often associated with PR reviews. PrArgue's efficient debate framework helps you reach consensus faster, speeding up the code review process.

Improve Code Review Quality: With structured debates, PrArgue aids in uncovering potential issues and encourages a more thorough review process, leading to higher code quality.

Inclusive Engagement: Whether you're a senior developer or a junior, PrArgue ensures that every voice is heard, creating a more inclusive and collaborative environment.
